DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect slow heart rate upon central peripheral blood pressure use medication call Ivabradine slow heart rate without affect heart contraction , compare effect ivabradine traditional blood pressure lower medication call metoprolol ( beta-blocker ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Heart Rate Reduction Upon Central Arterial Pressure Younger Older Healthy Individuals
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 25 year OR Aged > 60 year Exclusion Criteria Chronic disease Unable give inform consent Treated untreated systemic arterial hypertension ( SBP > 160 mmHg and/or DBP > 90 mmHg ) Resting bradycardia ( heart rate < 60 beats/minute ) Pregnancy active lactation
